introduction_english: Let's dive into the fascinating world of Japanese vocabulary with the term ほんもの, a word you're likely to encounter in situations where authenticity is in question, such as shopping for authentic goods or distinguishing between real and fake experiences.
meaning_explanation_english: The word ほんもの means "the real thing" or "authentic." It refers to something genuine as opposed to being a fake, imitation, or a replica. It's often used when you want to emphasize the truthfulness or authenticity of an item or situation.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 本格 : ほんかく : original method
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of ほんもの is ほんかく, which also relates to authenticity or something genuine. While ほんもの emphasizes the genuineness of an object or situation, ほんかく leans towards the idea of something being full-fledged or according to traditional methods.
antonyms: 偽物 : にせもの : spurious article
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of ほんもの is にせもの. While ほんもの denotes something genuine and real, にせもの refers to a fake, counterfeit, or imitation. It highlights the lack of authenticity and is typically used in contexts where there's a concern regarding the originality of an item.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は本物(ほんもの)です。

translations.MY: သူမသည်မှန်ကန်ပါသည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は本物の時間が好きだ。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は本物(ほんもの)の時間(じかん)が好き(すき)だ。

translations.VI: Anh ấy thích thời gian thực.
translations.MY: သူသည် အမှန်တကယ်အချိန်ကို ကြိုက်သည်။
translations.FA: اوی از زمان واقعی خوشش می‌آید.

example_sentences.kanji: これは本物のえんぴつです。
example_sentences.furigana: これ(これ)は本物(ほんもの)のえんぴつです。

translations.MY: ဤတစ်ခုသည်လက်ရှိခဲဖျက်ဖြစ်သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 本物の気持ちを知りたい。
example_sentences.furigana: 本物(ほんもの)の気持ち(きもち)を知(し)りたい。

translations.EN: I want to know the true feelings.
translations.ID: Saya ingin mengetahui perasaan yang sebenarnya.
translations.VI: Tôi muốn biết cảm giác thật sự là gì.
translations.FR: Je veux connaître les vrais sentiments.
translations.NE: म साँच्चिकै भावना थाहा पाउन चाहन्छु।
translations.TL: Nais kong malaman ang tunay na damdamin.
translations.MY: အမှန်တကယ် ထင်မြင်ချက်တွေကို သိချင်တယ်။
translations.HI: मैं असली भावनाएँ जानना चाहता हूँ।

example_sentences.kanji: これは本物の映画です。
example_sentences.furigana: これは本物(ほんもの)の映画(えいが)です。

translations.VI: Đây là một bộ phim thật.
translations.MY: ဒါက အမှန်တကယ်ရှိတဲ့ ရုပ်ရှင်ပါ။

genuine article.MY: မှန်ကန်သော ဆောင်းပါး

parts_of_speech: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
